title: Invoice Overdue
description: Fired when an invoice becomes overdue.

amount.description: The outstanding monetary amount of the invoice.

currency.description: ISO 4217 3-letter currency code (e.g. USD, EUR, GBP).

dueDate.description: ISO 8601 date or datetime when the invoice was due.

daysOverdue.description: The number of days the invoice is overdue.
